text: Women on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown () is a 1988 Spanish black comedy- drama movie directed by Pedro Almodóvar and starring Carmen Maura, Antonio Banderas, Julieta Serrano, María Barranco, Rossy de Palma, Kiti Mánver. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1989. ==Other websites== * Category:1988 comedy-drama movies Category:1980s black comedy movies Category:Spanish comedy movies Category:Spanish drama movies Category:Movies directed by Pedro Almodóvar Category:Movies set in Madrid Category:Movies adapted into plays Category:Movies about actors
title: Women on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown
